text: Responsibilities: Designing UI using Figma, front-end and back-end side implementing, testing
description: This area is weak because it's too general. It should quantify their experiences with metrics. Example, Designed UI, with +500 users and backend implementation with an API to handle 1000 requests/day, and 200 tests passing.

description: This area is weak because it doesn't directly showcase C++ skills, which are requested in the job description. While Java and Spring Boot are mentioned, it's not clear how this project relates to the C++ requirement. It could be improved by highlighting aspects relevant to system design, performance optimization, or backend architecture principles applicable across different languages.
